scripts.dev: echo "🚀 Starting MVP-Echo development..." && echo "" && concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "renderer,electron" "npm:dev:renderer" "npm:dev:electron"
scripts.dev:electron: echo "⚡ Starting Electron main process..." && set NODE_ENV=development&& electron app/main/main-simple.js
scripts.dev:portable: echo "🎁 Starting portable development mode..." && set NODE_ENV=development&& set PORTABLE_MODE=true&& electron app/main/main-simple.js
scripts.clean: echo "🧹 Step 1: Cleaning..." && npm run clean:python
scripts.build: echo "🔨 Step 2: Building frontend..." && vite build
scripts.build:standalone: echo "🏗️ Building standalone whisper executable..." && bash scripts/build-native-whisper.sh
scripts.prepare: echo "🚀 Step 2b: Preparing Whisper Native..." && npm run build:standalone
scripts.pack: echo "📦 Step 3: Packaging portable executable..." && npm run prepare && set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false&& electron-builder --win portable --publish=never
scripts.dist: echo "🚀 Building Windows installer..." && npm run build && electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.cleanup: echo "🧹 Cleaning dependencies..." && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean:python: echo "🧹 Cleaning Python embedded distribution..." && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/prepare-python.ps1 -Clean
scripts.test:python: echo "🧪 Testing Python embedded setup..." && powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/test-powershell.ps1 -TestSyntax
